name: Look Out! (DjKniteX, Msandfrey)
description:
You are now alone. You will stop at nothing to stop the evil swarm from taking over. You were able to save who you can and now you will continue to fight through, searching home to home to make sure your friends and family can have a home.

So look out while you're on the move. Who knows who will be there to stop you.

----

Team SKYNITE is back with a new game and this time we decided to do a roguelike adventure game using rot.js but with the chr15m boilerplate.

We added a new member to our team Quintin who did the additional sounds and the main game music.

Title screen by husalnawar25

Tiles: kenney.nl (modified by nikki/matthew)

css: NESS.css
